mapper.sql: cc.id, cc.parent_id, cc.cust_name, cc.un_credit_code, cc.cust_state, cc.is_cust, cc.is_public, cc.is_supplier, cc.cust_name_abbr, cc.cust_name_en, cc.cust_style, cc.cust_level, cc.industry_type, cc.country, cc.province, cc.city, cc.county, cc.area, cc.reg_date, cc.reg_addr, cc.reg_addr_en, cc.reg_tel, cc.cust_reg_tpye, cc.cust_reg_number, cc.cust_org_code, cc.buzlicense_expirdate, cc.legalperson_name, cc.actualcontrol_name, cc.is_taxpayer, cc.reg_capital, cc.paid_capital, cc.reg_currency, cc.oper_scope, cc.reg_org, cc.customs_code, cc.ciq_code, cc.cust_form, cc.supply_chain, cc.first_order_date, cc.fsales_id, cc.fsales_name, cc.follower_id, cc.follower_name, cc.onl_id, cc.onl_no, cc.is_sync, cc.f_level, cc.f_step, cc.check_state_flag, cc.old_cust_name, cc.cust_code, cc.supplier_code, cc.business_types, cc.service_type, cc.accounting_period, cc.reconciliation_method, cc.settlement_method, cc.industry, cc.website_url, cc.cust_enterprise_credit, cc.cust_import_credit, cc.cust_customs_credit, cc.transfer_public_time, cc.tenant_code, cc.remark, cc.is_deleted, cc.create_by, cc.create_time, cc.update_by, cc.update_time
mapper.update: UPDATE crm_customer SET is_deleted = 1 ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE id = ${id} AND is_deleted = 0

UPDATE crm_customer SET is_deleted = 1 ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id IN
#{id}

UPDATE crm_customer SET fsales_id = ${managerUserId}, fsales_name = #{managerUsername} ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id IN
#{id}

UPDATE crm_customer SET is_public = 0 ,fsales_id = ${managerUserId}, fsales_name = #{managerUsername} ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id IN
#{id}
mapper.select:
select cust_name custName,cust_name_abbr custNameAbbr,fsales_name fsalesName,fsales_id fsalesId,follower_name followerName,cust_code custCode, settlement_method settlementMethod from crm_customer c where c.is_deleted = 0 and c.check_state_flag = 'Y'
AND c.cust_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custName}, '%') or c.cust_name_abbr LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custName}, '%')

select cust_name custName,cust_name_abbr custNameAbbr,fsales_name fsalesName,fsales_id fsalesId,follower_name followerName,cust_code custCode, settlement_method settlementMethod from crm_customer c where c.is_deleted = 0 and c.check_state_flag = 'Y'
AND c.cust_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custName}, '%') or c.cust_name_abbr LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custName}, '%')
